page.title: 13BORWICK HALL (CONT)
page.content: The rooms here are mainly twin bedded. A T.V series was filmed here called {"The Ghosts of Motley Hall."}It was filmed in the mid 1970's.This was appropriate because the hall is said to be haunted by many{ghosts.}For eg.There is an interesting story about two soldiers.Once there was a banquet at Borwick Hall and after it everybody went to sit in the library.Under one of the shelves of books was a seat set back in the wall.The two men sat on this.After the party they were nowhere to be found.They were never seen again by anybody.It is said they must have sat on a secret panel and disappeared behind the wall.When the wall was measured it was found that the measurements from the outside were 4ft less than the measurements from inside.......
